plot: A short German film about an urban delinquent, Lilly, who catches the attention of Anna, a cute lesbian photographer and turns against two violent cohorts to save her from a fatal stabbing.
title: Mars
plot_es: A short German film about an urban delinquent, Lilly, who catches the attention of Anna, a cute lesbian photographer and turns against two violent cohorts to save her from a fatal stabbing.
plot_en: A short German film about an urban delinquent, Lilly, who catches the attention of Anna, a cute lesbian photographer and turns against two violent cohorts to save her from a fatal stabbing.
